user_query: I'm planning a family vacation to a new city and I need to check the weather forecast. Can you provide me with the current weather conditions and the forecast for the next week? Additionally, I would like to explore some educational resources from q-study to keep my kids engaged during the trip.

TaskList.description: Check the current weather conditions for the selected city.
Retrieve the weather forecast for the next week for the selected city.
Explore and retrieve educational resources from q-study for kids.
